appDescription.message: An extension recapture your own memory from browser.

unloadAllFromThisWindowExceptSelected.message: Unload All from This Window Except Selected Tab

unloadAllFromThisWindow.message: Unload All Tabs from This Window

antiMistouchDescription.message: When this is on, clicking on the extension icon(usually on the right of address bar) will be disabled. You must right click on the icon or pages to unload tabs.

startupUnloadCheckbox.message: Auto unload all tabs when startup

startupUnloadDescription.message: Unload all tabs when browser startup, avoid waste of resources.

languageDescription.message: Setting of language must through browser preference, please refer to

languageDescription2.message: How to set your browser's locale

languageListDescription.message: The following list is supported languages. When your language is not supported yet, extension will use the default language.

languageListDescription2.message: You can also join the translation team.
